name: Space Dragoons
description:
MULTIPLAYER  RETRO ARCADE SPACE SHOOTER BULLET HELL

CONTROLS

WHILE NOT ATTACHED TO THE SHIP:
MOVE - WASD
SHOOT GRAPPLING HOOK - LEFT CLICK

WHILE ATTACHED TO THE SHIP:
SHOOT - LEFT CLICK
JUMP FROM SHIP - SPACE

WHILE PILOTING TO THE SHIP:
MOVE - WASD
SHOOT - LEFT CLICK
EXIT FROM SHIP - SPACE

PLAYING WITH FRIENDS

TO PLAY WITH FRIENDS THE HOST MUST OPEN PORT 7777 AND PROVIDE YOU WITH THEIR IP ADDRESS.
